name: Babelway
tag_list: saas, cloud, cloud-computing, b2b-integration, edifact, edi, b2b, data-exchange
overview:
Babelway has built a SaaS application for B2B Integration. It allows organizations to automate cross-company processes and enables the secure exchange of business documents.

Due to the Saas nature of the application, any company can plug his current application (legacy or not) to the application of his business partner without making expensive changes to their current applications. All this without having to purchase any software or hardware.

The solution offers full control to the users. He can:

  • map messages directly from his browser using an online drag-and-drop tool.
  • track the messages that went through his communication channels
  • receive notification when errors occur.

To speed up the integration between partners, the Babelway catalogue contains message formats (EDIFACT, X12, XML, CSV, SAP, Excel, …) and protocols (FTP, AS2, X400, SOAP, SMTP, …) that are preconfigured for given business partners.

The Babelway application is built on top of a cloud architecture to guarantee scalability.

funding_rounds.source_description: Babelway obtains start-up financing from Emerge, Sherpa Invest and others
